body_html:
@yashk2810 thanks, it feels like a broken experience though specially since the docstring for fit says:

            batch_size: Integer or `None`.
                Number of samples per gradient update.
                If unspecified, `batch_size` will default to 32.

following your suggestion, is there a right value to set for validation_steps or is everything worked out based on validation_steps = val_set_size / batch_size relationship?
body_text:
@yashk2810 thanks, it feels like a broken experience though specially since the docstring for fit says:
            batch_size: Integer or `None`.
                Number of samples per gradient update.
                If unspecified, `batch_size` will default to 32.

following your suggestion, is there a right value to set for validation_steps or is everything worked out based on validation_steps = val_set_size / batch_size relationship?
body:
@yashk2810 thanks, it feels like a broken experience though specially since the docstring for `fit` says:
```
            batch_size: Integer or `None`.
                Number of samples per gradient update.
                If unspecified, `batch_size` will default to 32.
```
following your suggestion, is there a right value to set for `validation_steps` or is everything worked out based on `validation_steps = val_set_size / batch_size` relationship?
